idea-plugin.name: Bjoern Language Support
idea-plugin.description:
IntelliJ IDEA plugin for Bjoern BDD specification language support.
Features: - File type recognition for .zgr files with custom teal gem icon - Syntax highlighting for valid BDD keywords (Feature, Background, Given, When, Then, Scenario, Scenarios) - Invalid keyword detection and highlighting - Enhanced variable highlighting for double-quoted strings - Auto-indentation support with smart line indentation for proper BDD structure - Intelligent code completion for BDD keywords and common statements - YAML-based structure support
Indentation Rules: - Feature, Background, Scenarios: No indentation (column 0) - Given/When/Then under Background: 2 spaces - Scenario items under Scenarios: 2 spaces - Given/When/Then under Scenario: 4 spaces - List items under Given/When/Then in Background: 4 spaces - List items under Given/When/Then in Scenario: 6 spaces
